column4: i'd like to have a higher resolution than 800x600, but the only options i have in the screen resolution-box, are 800x600 and 480x640. what program do i use to fix this?
xorg.conf.... okay. where do i find this?
you did install the proper video card drivers for your video card?
Hmm.. no idea on sis. ive heard bad things about those.
